title: I have no respect for adrenaline junkies : r/unpopularopinion - Reddit
body: Adrenaline junkies are usually wearing tons of safety gear and working under trained professionals. The idiots who jump from roof to roof on sky scrapers, or drive themselves and their 2 year old on a quad with no helmets, are people who have abandoned reason and safety. 66. [deleted] • 10 mo. ago.
